CmdLine: ln -sf /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Seoul /etc/localtime        && locale-gen en_US.UTF-8       && apt-get update                   && apt-get install -y                   software-properties-common          wget                                sudo                            && apt-add-repository ppa:fish-shell/release-2      && add-apt-repository ppa:neovim-ppa/unstable       && apt-get update           && apt-get install -y           apt-transport-https         cmake                       curl                        fish                        default-jdk                 gdb                         git                         g++                         man-db                      neovim                      openssh-server              python-dev                  python-pip                  screen                      sysstat                     tmux                        vim                     && update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/vim vim /usr/bin/nvim 10      && update-alternatives --set vim /usr/bin/nvim                          && pip install neovim                                                   && useradd -m -u 12345 -d /home/sjkim/ sjkim                    && chsh -s /usr/bin/fish sjkim                                  && echo "sjkim:$(openssl rand -base64 20)" | chpasswd           && echo "sjkim ALL=NOPASSWD: ALL" > /etc/sudoers.d/sjkim        &&  mkdir /var/run/sshd                                                                                     && sed 's@session\s*required\s*pam_loginuid.so@session optional pam_loginuid.so@g' -i /etc/pam.d/sshd
Commands.Name: run
